Title: Chidiya
Writer: Mehran Amrohi (story), Amitabh Verma (screenplay), Mehran Amrohi (screenplay), Mehran Amrohi (dialogue), Ganesh Pandit (dialogue), Ambar Hadap (dialogue)
Actors: Svar Kamble, Ayush Pathak, Vinay Pathak, Amruta Subhash
Plot: The film is moving around the story of two kids aged 9 and 10, their dreams and the flight of their imaginations. Vinay Pathak is playing the role of their uncle who helps them to achieve ...
